description:
69 is a casual fast clicker game, each level you complete will be a great accomplishment.
Every level is totally random giving you a new experience every time.
The game is based of a true story for a rapper being confused with colored candy.Features
  • Steam Leaderboard to show off to your friends (if you have any)
  • Reaction speed increase
  • Memes
  • Hours of gameplay
  • The best meme Achievements
